cdist-type__postfix_reload(7)
=============================
Tell postfix to reload its configuration

Steven Armstrong <steven-cdist--@--armstrong.cc>


DESCRIPTION
-----------
This space intentionally left blank.


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
-------------------
None.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
-------------------
None.


EXAMPLES
--------

.. code-block:: sh

    __postfix_reload


SEE ALSO
--------
- `cdist-type(7) <cdist-type.html>`_
